title: Review ranked suppliers
subtitles: If you'd like to look at the details for each suppliers please visit the Search suppliers page on the main CCS website.
The page will open on a new tab.
p1: You've decided to take forward X suppliers. The X suppliers bellow, ranking between 1 and 2, will be automatically taken forward in your further competition event

p2: [ You also have X suppliers with a lower ranking that can be included. You’ll be asked to enter a justification for the suppliers you can select below. You need to select at least X supplier(s).]
